domain
Class AIControlled

java.lang.Object
  domain.Sprite
      domain.Animated
          domain.AIControlled
All Implemented Interfaces:
Renderable, Updatable, Actionable, Collisionable, Movable, Reactable, Statitzable
public abstract class AIControlled
extends Animated
implements Reactable

This class represents a game entity wich is controlled by it's artificial intelligence implementation.
